Posts.Content: May 22, 2010 03:45PM Better-Body-Babe wrote: Hi Jep-- I was just reading another thread on this site with someone going through the waiting game, too.  It's miserable.  But once you have a plan of attack, you'll feel better.  I had the OncoType test to determine if I needed Chemo-- I didn't.  I was not a candidate for radiation because I had previous radiation for Hodkin's Lymphoma (which probably caused my breast cancer-- but if I had not had it, I wouldn't be here today!).  So, I had a double mastectomy and reconstruction all in the same procedure about seven weeks ago and am moving on with life.  It will happen to you, too.  Just ask your mom!
Posts.Title: Waiting..Worrying...Oh My Lord! jep fransavin01
